== Source organization ==
  * *trunk/*: _stable_ branch, check out this!
    * *aprofplot/*: a java GUI for displaying aprof log
    * *benchmark/*: tools used for aprof's benchmarks
      * *test/*: some simple programs with different behaviour (small sms, linear, quadratic, etc)
      * *dsp/*: main benchmark for aprof, run different graph algorithms
    * *valgrind/*: [http://valgrind.org/ valgrind code]
       * *aprof/*: source code of aprof
  * *branches/function/*: experimental branch, attempt to implement function tracking entry/exit point within Valgrind (stable branch use GCC instrumentation)
    * *valgrind/aprof*: broken version of aprof, fixed when TF will be complete/robust
    * *valgrind/tf*: new valgrind tool, more updated code on function tracing with Valgrind, not complete
